text: Don't be pushed around by the fears in your mind. Be led by the dreams in your heart. -Roy T. Bennett, The Light in the Heart
Cry. Forgive. Learn. Move on. Let your tears water the seeds of your future happiness. -Steve Maraboli
The man who moves a mountain begins by carrying away small stones. ― Confucius, Confucius: The Analects
Learn the rules like a pro, so you can break them like an artist. ― Pablo Picasso
Although the world is full of suffering, it is full also of the overcoming of it. ― Helen Keller
“Everything is hard before it is easy ― Goethe J.W.
